important-information-paragraph-1.message: This page is for the Firefox add-on. Get Adblock Plus products on other supported platforms and devices.

hero-banner-alt.message: The Adblock Plus for Firefox interface

hero-subheading.message: Brings you a cleaner, faster internet experience without intrusive ads

hero-paragraph-1.message: Adblock Plus blocks intrusive and malicious advertisements, while supporting website creators via Acceptable Ads by default (this, however, is configurable).

hero-download-tos.message: By clicking on the buttom below, you agree to our Terms of Use

hero-download-other-label.message: Download Adblock Plus for another browser

special-features-heading.message: What you can do with Adblock Plus on Firefox

special-features-paragraph-1.message: Adblock Plus keeps your computer clean of annoying advertisements like pop-ups and video ads, while also fighting against damaging malvertising infections and speeding-up page-loading times.

how-it-works-image-alt.message: How the ABP ad blocking extension for Firefox looks

how-it-works-heading.message: How the Firefox ad blocker works

how-it-works-paragraph-1.message: Once you have Adblock Plus installed, you can find it on your Firefox menu. It will begin to block ads automatically and can be adjusted through Settings to add whitelists, create filters, and block social media trackers, amongst other things.

supporting-websites-image-alt.message: Support websites with the Acceptable Ads initiative

supporting-websites-paragraph-1.message: Adblock Plus comes by default with Acceptable Ads enabled, though this can be turned off easily at any time. With Acceptable Ads on, you are still filtering out annoying ads and pop-ups, but allowing some nonintrusive ads which helps content producers to receive monetization for their work. The goal is to facilitate an environment of fairness and sustainability for user, advertiser, and creator alike. Learn more

download-paragraph-1.message: By downloading and installing this extension, you agree to our Terms of Use and our Privacy Policy.

download-other-label.message: Download Adblock Plus for another browser
